Text: Michigan Court of Appeals Virus AlertThe Michigan Court of Appeals has asked the State Bar of Michigan to provide the following information directly to its members via email The Michigan Court of Appeals website has been infected by the Nimda worm virus and so will be inaccessible until further notice Please contact the local Clerks Office of the Court by telephone at one of the numbers listed below if you are in need of information provided on the website Visitors to the website during the past few days may want to check their computer systems to ensure that they are not infected with the Nimda worm Detroit Clerks office through on and thereafter Southfield Clerks office Lansing Clerks office Grand Rapids Clerks office You are currently subscribed to coavirusalert as To unsubscribe send a blank email to
